mapper.select: SELECT ts.no as nt_no, ts.nt_title, ts.loginID, ts.nt_note, DATE_FORMAT(ts.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date, ts.filename, ts.filesize, ts.filepath, le.loginID AS teacherID FROM tb_task ts LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_lecture le ON ts.no = le.no WHERE ts.loginID = #{loginId} LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(ts.no) FROM tb_task ts LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_lecture le ON ts.no = le.no WHERE ts.loginID = #{loginId}
